thread.title: Maroon 5's 'Sugar' music video is being turned into a weekly series produced by Adam Levine - US TV
thread.title_full: Maroon 5's 'Sugar' music video is being turned into a weekly series produced by Adam Levine - US TV News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Maroon 5's 'Sugar' music video is being turned into a weekly series produced by Adam Levine - US TV
text: Maroon 5's 'Sugar' music video impressed NBC so much that the network is turning it into a television pilot.The David Dobkin-directed clip - which racked up almost a billion YouTube views – featured the group surprising brides with a serenade at their weddings.Dobkin remains on board to direct NBC's Untitled Adam Levine Show spinoff, with Maroon 5's Levine producing.Each potential episode will feature a different celebrity surprising a fan at a significant life event.NBC described the series as follows: "A couple about to get married suddenly discovers that a world famous recording artist is leading the house band. An Emmy Award-winning actor becomes an unexpected guest of a bachelorette party. © Getty Images / Jamie McCarthy/WireImage "Working with a team of improv experts who create the element of surprise, these stars give their fans a moment together they will never forget and turn their already special event into something extraordinary."Levine currently works with NBC as a coach on The Voice, and is also developing a songwriting competition for the Peacock Network.
